text: Kwena Bellemare-Boivin is a Canadian film actress, who garnered a nomination for Best Supporting Actress at the 5th Canadian Screen Awards for her performance in Before the Streets (Avant les rues). A member of the Atikamekw nation from Wemotaci, Quebec, she is the sister of Rykko Bellemare, who played the film's lead role. She also sings and dances with the Atikamekw traditional music group Northern Voice, and has appeared in the APTN television series Brigade des Nations and Le rythme. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Atikamekw people Category:Canadian film actresses Category:Canadian television actresses Category:Actresses from Quebec Category:Singers from Quebec Category:Algonquin people Category:First Nations actresses Category:First Nations musicians Category:First Nations dancers Category:People from Mauricie Category:Living people Category:21st-century Canadian dancers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kwena Bellemare-Boivin
